Subject: Urgent Payment Needed for Overdue Invoice

Dear [Customer],

I hope this email finds you well. We are writing to inform you that we have noticed an overdue invoice on our records for the services provided to your company. The payment was due on [date], and we have yet to receive any payment from your end.

As a valued customer, we understand that oversights can happen, and we are here to assist you in resolving this matter promptly. We kindly request that you make the payment as soon as possible to avoid any further complications. 

Please find attached the invoice in question for your reference. We would greatly appreciate it if you could process the payment within the next 24 hours to avoid any late fees or disruptions to your services.

If you have any questions or need assistance with making the payment, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We are here to help and ensure a smooth resolution to this matter.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this request. We look forward to receiving your payment soon.

Warm regards,

[Vendor's Name]
[Vendor's Contact Information]
